attributes.action: UK to pressure Luxembourg to rejoin Eurovision
attributes.additional_details: Luxembourg have won the competition many times. Their re-entry would increase the quality of the competition. Bozza Jozza could get one back after the embarrassment in Luxembourg the other year.
attributes.background: Apply diplomatic pressure to the government of Luxembourg and call on our wealth of allies to join the cause.

rejection.details: Decisions about whether Luxembourg participate in the Eurovision Song Contest are a matter for public broadcasters in Luxembourg, not the Government or House of Commons.
